entries.title: Until We Meet Again
entries.content: My love, if you are reading this, know that every sunset still carries a piece of me watching over you. You were my greatest adventure, and in every quiet moment, I am with you.

entries.title: The Light You Left Behind
entries.content: You were always the warmth in the cold, the light in the dimmest rooms. Even now, I find you in the spaces between heartbeats, reminding me that love never truly fades.

entries.title: If Love Had a Shape
entries.content: If love had a shape, it would be the curve of your smile. If love had a sound, it would be your laughter filling the spaces of my days. If love could never die, then we are eternal.

entries.title: A Whisper in the Wind
entries.content: I still reach for your hand in the quiet moments. Even though you are not here, the wind carries your voice, and in it, I find home.

entries.title: The Echo of Us
entries.content: Love is not measured in days or years, but in the echoes we leave behind. You are in every song, every touch of the breeze, every soft morning light that kisses my skin.

entries.author: Oliver Hayes
entries.title: You Are My Always
entries.content: Even in the silence, you are my always. Even in the distance, you are my here. Even in the absence, you are my forever. I deeply feel seen by you. I love you Shaun
